GOVERNMENT, LAW someone, such as a politician, who is responsible for making and changing laws: He told lawmakers that studies from three states have shown only negligible increases in insurance premium prices.lawmakers approve/pass/vote (sth) Lawmakers passed legislation to lift the trade ban.
